name: wanchain-wns-network-map
description: A simple map of wanchain networks to WNS registry addresses.

scripts.test:coverage: nyc npm run test:unit && npm run test:coveralls-upload
scripts.test:coveralls-upload: if [ $COVERALLS_REPO_TOKEN ]; then nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls; fi

author: Tyrion70
